00063 inline void Rates::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options){
00064         
00065     double temp= options->get("options.rates.temperature").as<double>();
00066     _kT=temp*8.6173324e-5;
00067     _E = options->get("options.rates.field").as<vec>();
00068    // _omegavib=0.2;
00069    // _nmaxvib=10;
00070       if (options->exists("options.rates.method")) {
00071         if (options->get("options.rates.method").as<string > () == "marcus") {
00072                 _rate_type='M';
00073             cout << "Computing rates from Marcus theory"<< endl;
00074         }
00075         else if (options->get("options.rates.method").as<string > () == "jortner") {
00076                 _rate_type='J';
00077         if (options->exists("options.rates.nmaxvib")) {
00078         _nmaxvib = options->get("options.rates.nmaxvib").as<double>();
00079     } else {
00080         _nmaxvib = 20;
00081         cout << "Warning: no cutoff number for qm vibrations  provided, using default 20" << endl;
00082     }
00083         if (options->exists("options.rates.omegavib")) {
00084         _omegavib = options->get("options.rates.omegavib").as<double>();
00085     } else {
00086         _omegavib = 0.2;
00087         cout << "Warning: no qm vibration frequency  provided, using default 0.2eV" << endl;
00088     }
00089 
00090             cout << "Computing rates from Jortner summing up to " <<_nmaxvib << " quanta using a frequency of "<<_omegavib << " eV" << endl;
00091         }
00092 
00093         else throw std::runtime_error("Error in CalcRates::Initialize : no such rates method, should be marcus  or jortner");
00094     } else throw std::runtime_error("Error in Rates:Initialize : no rates_method specified");
00095 
00096 }
00097 
00098 inline void Rates::EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair* pair){
00099     double rate_12 = 0.0;
00100     double rate_21 = 0.0;
00101     double Jeff2 = pair->calcJeff2();
00102     QMCrgUnit *crg1 = pair->first;
00103     QMCrgUnit *crg2 = pair->second;
00104             if (pair->DoubleExists("lambda_outer")) {
00105                 double lambda_outer = pair->getDouble("lambda_outer");
00106                 if ((_rate_type == 'J') && (lambda_outer < 0.0)) {
00107                     cout << "Pair" << crg1->getId() << " : " << crg2->getId() << " has negative outer sphere reorganization energy preventing computation  of Jortner rates." << endl;
00108                     throw std::runtime_error("Error in CalcRates::EvaluatePair: negative outer sphere reorganization");
00109                 }
00110                 if ((_rate_type == 'J') && (lambda_outer < 0.01)) 
00111                     cout << "Warning: in CalcRates::EvaluatePair : pair " << crg1->getId() << " : " << crg2->getId() << " has very small outer sphere reorganization energy (< 0.01eV) which might produce too high Jortner rates."<<endl;
00112            
00113             }
00114             else {
00115                 if (_rate_type == 'J') {
00116                     cout << "Pair" << crg1->getId() << " : " << crg2->getId() << ": has not outer sphere reorganization energy necessary to compute Jortner rates. Compute lambdaouter or use Marcus rates."<<endl;
00117                             throw std::runtime_error("Error in CalcRates::EvaluatePair: no outer sphere reorganization");
00118                 }
00119             }
00120 
00121     
00123     double prefactor = 1.0;
00125     double reorg12 = crg1->getDouble("lambda_intra_discharging")+crg2->getDouble("lambda_intra_charging");
00126     double reorg21 = crg2->getDouble("lambda_intra_discharging")+crg1->getDouble("lambda_intra_charging");
00128     double dG_field = -_E * unit<nm,m>::to(pair->r());
00130     double dG_en = crg2->getTotalEnergy() - crg1->getTotalEnergy();
00133     double dG = dG_field + dG_en;
00134  
00135        if (_rate_type=='J'){ 
00137     double huang_rhys12 = reorg12/_omegavib;
00138     double huang_rhys21 = reorg21/_omegavib;
00139  
00140     int nn;
00141     for (nn = 0; nn<=_nmaxvib; nn++) {
00143     dG = dG_field + dG_en;
00144     rate_12 = rate_12 + prefactor * sqrt(M_PI/(pair->getDouble("lambda_outer") * _kT)) * Jeff2 * exp(-huang_rhys12) * pow(huang_rhys12,nn) / Factorial(nn) *
00145             exp (-(dG + nn*_omegavib + pair->getDouble("lambda_outer"))*(dG + nn*_omegavib +pair->getDouble("lambda_outer"))/(4*_kT*pair->getDouble("lambda_outer")))/hbar_eV;
00147     dG = -dG_field - dG_en;
00148     rate_21 = rate_21 + prefactor * sqrt(M_PI/(pair->getDouble("lambda_outer") * _kT)) * Jeff2 * exp(-huang_rhys21) * pow(huang_rhys21,nn) / Factorial(nn) *
00149             exp (-(dG + nn*_omegavib +pair->getDouble("lambda_outer"))*(dG + nn*_omegavib +pair->getDouble("lambda_outer"))/(4*_kT*pair->getDouble("lambda_outer")))/hbar_eV;
00150     }
00151 }//end J
00152 
00153 if (_rate_type=='M'){
00154  if (pair->DoubleExists("lambda_outer")){
00155 reorg12=reorg12+ pair->getDouble("lambda_outer");
00156 reorg21=reorg21+ pair->getDouble("lambda_outer");}
00157 rate_12 = prefactor * sqrt(M_PI/(reorg12 * _kT)) * Jeff2 *
00158             exp (-(dG + reorg12)*(dG + reorg12)/(4*_kT*reorg12))/hbar_eV;
00160     dG = -dG_field - dG_en;
00161     rate_21 = prefactor * sqrt(M_PI/(reorg21 * _kT)) * Jeff2 *
00162             exp (-(dG + reorg21)*(dG + reorg21)/(4*_kT*reorg21))/hbar_eV;
00163 }//end M
00164     pair->setRate12(rate_12);
00165     //cout<<rate_12;
00166     pair->setRate21(rate_21);
00167 }
00168 
00169 int Rates::Factorial(int i) {
00170     int k,j;
00171 k=1;
00172 for(j=1;j<i;j++)
00173   {
00174   k=k*(j+1);
00175   }
00176 return k;
00177 }

00180 /* polymer rates (adiabatic rates from polypyrrole paper)
00181 
00182 void PolymerRates::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options)
00183 {   
00184     // prefactor (something like a nuclear frequency)
00185     _nu = options->get("options.calc_rates.polymer.nu").as<double>();;
00186     
00187     _J=0;
00188     
00189     // transfer integrals for J=J_0 * cos(phi)
00190     if(options->exists("options.calc_rates.polymer.J0"))
00191         _J = options->get("options.calc_rates.polymer.J0").as<double>();;
00192     
00193     // thermal energy in eV
00194     _kT = options->get("options.calc_rates.thermal_energy").as<double>();
00195     // electric field vector in V/m
00196     _E = options->get("options.calc_rates.e_field").as<vec>();
00197 }
00198 
00199 bool PolymerRates::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top)
00200 {
00201     InteractionContainer::iterator iter;
00202 
00203     // iterator over all molecules
00204     for(MoleculeContainer::iterator imol = top->Molecules().begin();
00205           imol!=top->Molecules().end(); ++imol) {
00206         // now go over all connections and check weather they connect two charge units
00207         for(int i=0; i<(*imol)->BeadCount()-1; ++i) { // hack for linear molecules
00208 
00209             QMBead *b1 = dynamic_cast<QMBead*>((*imol)->getBead(i));
00210             QMBead *b2 = dynamic_cast<QMBead*>((*imol)->getBead(i+1));
00211 
00212             QMCrgUnit *crg1 = b1->GetCrgUnit();
00213             QMCrgUnit *crg2 = b2->GetCrgUnit();
00214 
00215             // are the two beads on same crg unit or crgunit is null -> ignore
00216             if((crg1 == crg2)
00217                     || (crg1 == NULL )
00218                     || (crg2 == NULL ))
00219                 continue;
00220 
00221             // swap if ordering is mixed up
00222             if(crg1->getId() > crg2->getId())
00223                 swap(crg1,crg2);
00224 
00225             // is there already a pair for these two crgunits
00226             QMPair *pair = top->nblist().FindPair(crg1, crg2);
00227             if(!pair) { // if not create one
00228                 pair = new QMPair(crg1, crg2, top);
00229                 top->nblist().AddPair(pair);
00230             }
00231             
00232             // calculate the transfer integral
00233             double cos_u= b1->U() * b2->U() / (abs(b1->U())*abs(b2->U()));
00234             double J = _J*cos_u;
00235 
00236             // calculate rates for both directions
00237             pair->setRate12(CalcRate(pair->first, pair->second, pair->r(), J));
00238             pair->setRate21(CalcRate(pair->second, pair->first, -pair->r(), J));
00239         }
00240     }
00241 }
00242 
00243 // adiabatic rate expression
00244 double PolymerRates::CalcRate(QMCrgUnit *crg1, QMCrgUnit *crg2, vec dist, double J)
00245 {    
00246     double dE_nofield = crg2->getTotalEnergy() - crg1->getTotalEnergy();
00247     double reorg = 0.5*(crg1->getDouble("lambda_intra_discharging") + crg2->getDouble("lambda_charging")+crg2->getDouble("lambda_intra_discharging") + crg1->getDouble("lambda_charging"));
00248     
00249     double dE =  dE_nofield - unit<nm,m>::to(dist) * _E;
00250     double DG_star = ( dE + reorg)*(dE + reorg)/(4*reorg);
00251 
00252     // J lowers the barrier
00253     DG_star -= fabs(J);
00254     double rate = _nu * exp ( -DG_star  / _kT  ) ;
00255 }
00256 */
00257 }}
